info.name: Investoo Wallet System API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Investoo Wallet System Backend.

## Authentication
This API uses cookie-based JWT authentication. After login, the `access_token` cookie is set automatically.

## Base URL
Set the `{{baseUrl}}` variable to your server URL (e.g., `http://localhost:3000`).

## Roles
- **USER**: Regular users
- **ADMIN**: Administrators with elevated privileges

item.name: Authentication
item.description: User registration, login, and logout endpoints

request.description:
PUBLIC: Register a new user account.

**Password Requirements:**
- Minimum 8 characters
- At least one uppercase letter
- At least one lowercase letter
- At least one number
- At least one special character

**referralCode** is optional.

PUBLIC: Login for both USER and ADMIN roles.

Returns user data with role. Sets `access_token` httpOnly cookie.
AUTH REQUIRED (ANY role): Logout and clear auth cookie.
AUTH REQUIRED (ANY role): Get the currently authenticated user's profile.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all users with pagination.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Get any user's profile by their ID.

AUTH REQUIRED (ANY role): Update current user's profile.

All fields are optional.

AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Update any user's profile including role.

**role** options: USER, ADMIN
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Get current user's wallet balance, available balance, and pending withdrawals.
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Get current user's wallet transaction ledger with pagination.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Get any user's wallet balance.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Get any user's wallet transaction ledger.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Get all wallet transactions across all users with pagination and filters.

AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Submit a recharge request.

Required fields: amount, blockchainAddress, chainName, transactionId.
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Get current user's recharge history.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all pending recharge requests.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all recharges with pagination.

AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Approve or reject a recharge request.

**status** options: APPROVED, REJECTED

**adminRemark** is optional.

AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Submit a withdrawal request.

Required fields: amount, blockchainAddress, chainName.
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Get current user's withdrawal history.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all pending withdrawal requests.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all withdrawals with pagination.

AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Approve or reject a withdrawal request.

**status** options: APPROVED, REJECTED

**adminRemark** is optional.

request.description:
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Create a new investment plan.

**validity**: Number of days (1-365)

**referralReward** and **dailyReturn** are optional.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Update an existing plan. All fields are optional (partial update).
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Activate a deactivated plan.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Deactivate an active plan.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all plans (active and inactive) with pagination.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Soft delete a plan.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Get dashboard summary metrics (total users, revenue, recharges, withdrawals).
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Get chart data for dashboard visualizations.
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Purchase/subscribe to a plan. Deducts the plan price from wallet balance.
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Get current user's active subscription details.
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Get current user's subscription history (all past and current subscriptions).
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all subscriptions with pagination.
AUTH REQUIRED (USER): Get current user's daily return logs.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): List all daily return logs with pagination.
AUTH REQUIRED (ADMIN only): Manually trigger daily returns processing for all active subscriptions.

item.name: Schemas
item.description: Dynamic form schema endpoints for frontend form generation

request.description:
PUBLIC: Get list of all registered form schema names.

Returns: `{ schemas: ['register', 'login', 'create-plan', ...] }`

PUBLIC: Get schema definition for dynamic form generation.

Returns field definitions with types, labels, validation rules, and typeahead configs.

PUBLIC: Get list of all registered grid schema names.

Returns: `{ schemas: ['users', 'plans', 'recharges', ...] }`

PUBLIC: Get grid schema definition for grid generation.

Returns column definitions with types, labels, sortable, filterable options, and typeahead configs.
